name: The Coagula Contest
summary: This contest was run mid-September to mid-November of 2001, with the goal of creating maps in the tradition of Tim Elek's 'Coagula' series of maps - a series of structures floating in the void. There were 5 entries: Tronyn(2), Fat Controller, Dilvish, and Necros. In addition, a start map created by Tronyn is included, as well as the original Coagula series by Tim Elek.
